Like always, it extracts in the wrong place.
It will extract in a 'tomb raider' folder inside tomb raider folder. Just copy and paste in proper folder.
And then modify skidrow.ini to language 'english' instead of russian.
It adds quite a few important fixes, and much better looking and performance to tressfx hair.

Works great.

FOR ENGLISH: Edit skidrow ini in text editor to say english instead -_-
It also works with the nosteam release

maybe it was this update or maybe cause i turned shadows off in options

if you guys who game still crashes then try to turn shadows off and if then the game dont crash maybe it helps

i have intel E8600 and geforce 9800gt everything is ultra and shadows is off with resolution 720p
you are playing the game in dx9 mode...different story...

well it worked for someone who had gtx 560ti with shadow off and no crashing thats why i tried and my game dont freeze anymore ... it frozed every after 10-15min of game play

just try to turn off shadows and try if it works
those who have Nvidia and gettings crashes - turn tesselation, TressFX hair and exclusive fullscreen off, also lower ambient occlusion and AA to get smooth fps.
